description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows Registry elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-43641), it is crucial to apply the necessary updates for your specific version of Windows:

1. Identify your Windows version and build number from the list below:
   - Windows 11 Version 24H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.26100.2314 (Update: KB5046617)
   - Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.22631.4460 (Update: KB5046633)
   - Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.19045.5131 (Update: KB5046613)
   - Additional versions are also available for other configurations according to the provided update package links.

2. Download the appropriate update package from the Microsoft Update Catalog:
   - [KB5046617](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046617)
   - [KB5046633](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046633)
   - [KB5046613](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046613)
   - [KB5046665](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046665)

3. Follow the installation instructions for your system to ensure successful application of the updates.

**Details**:
- This update resolves an integer overflow or wraparound vulnerability that may allow elevation of privilege if successfully exploited.
- It is important to note that users may need administrative rights to install these updates.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure the system is of the indicated version before proceeding with the update installation.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with any system changes.
